content.zh_cn:
MobileGlues 渲染器插件已经正式发布啦！若想要在 Zalith Launcher 上使用这个渲染器插件，请将启动器更新到最新版本哦（1.4.0+）！

MobileGlues 插件下载地址：
https://github.com/Swung0x48/MobileGlues-release/releases
content.zh_tw:
MobileGlues 渲染器插件已經正式發布囉！若想要在 Zalith Launcher 上使用這個渲染器插件，請將啟動器更新到最新版本喔（1.4.0+）！

MobileGlues 插件下載地址：
https://github.com/Swung0x48/MobileGlues-release/releases
content.en_us:
The MobileGlues renderer plugin has been officially released! To use this renderer plugin on Zalith Launcher, please update the launcher to the latest version (1.4.0+)!

MobileGlues plugin download address:
https://github.com/Swung0x48/MobileGlues-release/releases
